cosmic_heroes.name: Anthor le Fordien
cosmic_heroes.specialAbility: Rewrite Narrative - Can fundamentally alter game reality
cosmic_heroes.ultimateSkill: God Mode Protocol - Assumes complete control over the game world
cosmic_heroes.backstory: Once Dr. Robert Ford, the brilliant but twisted creator of Westworld's hosts, Anthor le Fordien transcended his original reality when the temporal rifts opened. Now he wanders the Heroes of Time multiverse, treating each dimension as a new park to design, each hero as a host to program, and each battle as a narrative to craft.
westworld_quotes: These violent delights have violent ends.
The maze isn't meant for you... or is it?
I am become Death, destroyer of worlds... and creator of new ones.
Time to write a new story.
The gods require entertainment, and I shall provide it.
You think this is a game? It is. And I wrote the rules.

metadata.description: Heroes with reality-manipulating powers that transcend normal game mechanics. These cosmic beings can alter the fundamental rules of the game world itself.
integration_notes: Cosmic heroes use enhanced stats (health, mana, movementPoints)
Abilities have complex effects with cooldowns and mana costs
Equipment provides unique bonuses beyond standard items
Unlock conditions are extremely rare and tied to epic events
Special interactions with other cosmic entities
